description: Try our easy to follow Caesar Salad With Chicken, Bacon & Parmesan recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Caesar Salad With Chicken, Bacon & Parmesan
name: Caesar Salad With Chicken, Bacon & Parmesan Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add the toasted bread cubes and salad dressing and toss well to mix. Sprinkle over the reserved bacon pieces and the Parmesan shavings. Serve straight away.
